explanation: [0-0] On a football field, a row of players in white jerseys stands. Beside them, players in purple jerseys are also standing. Behind them, there are players in blue shirts and black pants. The stands are filled with spectators. A magnifying glass icon appears on the screen, within which are three players in white jerseys and one player in a purple jersey with the number 7. Above it is the yellow caption "BROZOVIC." Below is the white caption "BROZOVIC."

[0-5] Subsequently, BROZOVIC lies down at the feet of a row of players in white jerseys. At this moment, the player in the purple jersey with the number 9 is about to shoot. Then, the players in white jerseys jump up together. The ball hits BROZOVIC and bounces over the goal.

The player in the yellow jersey with the number 13 is about to shoot, facing two players in white jerseys. Below is the white caption "GUERREIRO." The player in the yellow jersey with the number 13 feints a shot, then turns back and passes the ball to a teammate. His teammate heads the ball into the goal.
